meanings.definition: The act of producing a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper or another surface.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys drawing pictures of animals in her sketchbook.
meanings.sent2: I need a ruler for this drawing to make straight lines.
meanings.sent3: The drawing of a stick figure with a crown on its head made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her drawing of a sunset was so realistic, it felt like you could step into it.
meanings.sent5: The drawing of the dragon was so detailed, it looked like it could come to life.

meanings.definition: A picture or diagram produced by making lines and marks on paper or another surface.
meanings.sent1: The drawing of the map helped us find our way through the forest.
meanings.sent2: She framed the drawing of the flower and hung it on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The drawing of a smiley face on the cake made it look extra special.
meanings.sent4: His drawing of a heart symbolized his love for art.
meanings.sent5: The drawing of the city skyline captured the hustle and bustle of urban life.
